summary: converted from Corthian's Akaviri Japanese Clothing v6
descriptionHtml:
First of all - this is legal conversion:
"No permission needed to alter or use these files, just remember to credit me the creator of the meshes and textures."

Short decription:
Because there are no kimonos with hakama pants and wider sleeves for Skyrim i tried to converse this one from Corthian's clothes (http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/25908/?) but since i dont have time for learning 3ds/blender stuff etc. i want to share with you my unfinished model. I hope someday, somebody will finish this for me and all Skyrim oriental stuff fans!

Installation:
just unpack rar file into skyrim/data

In game:
type in console 'help shinigami robe' and so on.

Sorry for my english.

Credits:
Corthian for Corthian Akaviri Japanese Clothes 6
author: misiek023
